# Cleaning the Data


## Cleaning the Data 


::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,1); font-size:20pt" }
-   Creating a Tidy Dataframe 
:::
::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,0.3); font-size:20pt"}
-   Convert all Letters to Lowercase
:::
::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,0.3); font-size:20pt"}
-   Remove Numbers, Punctuation, Stopwords
:::
``` {.r code-line-numbers="1-4"}
HICSS_words <- HICSSfiles %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text) %>%
  count(paper_id, word, sort =TRUE) %>%
  ungroup()
HICSS_words$word <- HICSS_words$word %>% str_to_lower() 
HICCS_words$word <- gsub("[[:punct:]]|[[:digit:]]|^http:\\/\\/.*|^https:\\/\\/.*",
                              "", HICCS_words$word)
HICSS_words <- HICSS_words %>%
  filter(!word %in% custom_stopwords) %>%
  anti_join(stop_words)
HICSS_words$word[HICSS_words$word==""]<- NA
HICSS_words_comp <- HICSS_words[complete.cases(HICSS_words), ]
```

``` {.r code-line-numbers="6-12"}
HICSS_words <- HICSSfiles %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text) %>%
  count(paper_id, word, sort =TRUE) %>%
  ungroup()
```

# Term Frequency Analysis

## Term Frequency- Corpus as a Whole

::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,1); font-size:20pt" }
-   Stemming the Words
:::
::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,0.3); font-size:20pt"}
-   Sum of Stemmed Words, entire corpus
:::
::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,0.3); font-size:20pt"}
-   Top 100 Words in Corpus
:::
``` {.r code-line-numbers="1-2"}
HICSS_stemmed <- HICSS_words_comp %>%
  mutate(stem = SnowballC::wordStem(HICSS_words_comp$word))
HICSS_stemmed_sums2 <- dcast(HICSS_stemmed_sums, stem ~ "n", value.var="n", fun.aggregate=sum)
HICSS_stemmed_sums2 <- HICSS_stemmed_sums2 %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  slice_head(n=100)
```

# (Term Frequency) x (Inverse Document Frequency) / TF*IDF

## TF\*IDF

::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,1); font-size:20pt" }
-   Make table of total words in corpus
:::
::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,0.3); font-size:20pt"}
-   Join the total words table with the HICSS words table
:::
::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,0.3); font-size:20pt"}
-   Create TF*IDF chart
:::
::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,0.3); font-size:20pt"}
-   Arrange by Document 
:::
``` {.r code-line-numbers="1-3"}
total_words <- HICSS_stemmed_sums %>%
  group_by(paper_id) %>%
  summarize(total = sum(n))
HICSS_words3 <- left_join(HICSS_stemmed_sums, total_words)
HICSS_tfidf <- HICSS_words3 %>%
  bind_tf_idf(stem, paper_id, n) %>%
  select(-total) %>%
  group_by(paper_id) %>%
  arrange(desc(tf_idf, .by_group=TRUE))
HICSS_tfidf_bydoc <- HICSS_tfidf %>%
  group_by(paper_id) %>%
  arrange(desc(tf_idf), .by_group = TRUE))
```

# N-Gram Analysis

## N-Gram Analysis

::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,1); font-size:20pt ; margin-bottom:-10px" }
-   Make the Bigrams Table
:::
::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,0.3); font-size:20pt ; margin-bottom:-10px"}
-   Separate the Bigrams into 2 Words
:::
::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,0.3); font-size:20pt ; margin-bottom:-10px"}
-   Filter Numbers and Stopwords from Words
:::
::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,0.3); font-size:20pt ; margin-bottom:-10px"}
-   Re-unite the Words into Bigrams without Stopwords; look at top 100
:::
``` {.r code-line-numbers="1-3"}
HICCS_bigrams <- HICSSfiles %>%
  unnest_tokens(bigram, text, token="ngrams", n=2) %>%
  count(bigram, sort =TRUE)
HICCS_bigrams_separated <- HICCS_bigrams %>%
  separate(bigram, c("word1", "word2"), sep = " ")
HICCS_bigrams_filtered <- HICCS_bigrams_separated %>%
  filter(!word1 %in% stop_words$word) %>% filter(!word2 %in% stop_words$word) %>%
  filter(!word1 %in% numbers) %>% filter(!word2 %in% numbers) %>%
  filter(!word1 %in% bigrams_stopwords) %>% filter(!word2 %in% bigrams_stopwords)
HICCS_bigrams_united <- HICCS_bigrams_filtered %>%
  unite(bigram, word1, word2, sep= " ")
HICSS_100bigrams <- HICCS_bigrams_united %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% slice_head(n=100)
```

# Sentiment Analysis

## Applying Dictionaries: Sentiment Analysis: Bing

::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,1); font-size:20pt" }
-   Join the HICSS Word dataframe with the "bing" sentiment dictionary 
:::
::: {.nonincremental style="color: rgba(0,0,0,0.3); font-size:20pt"}
-   Group to show top 50 negative and postive words
:::

```{.r code-line-numbers="1-6"}
HICSS_bing <- HICSS_words_comp %>%
  inner_join(get_sentiments("bing")) %>%
  count(word, sentiment, sort=TRUE) %>%
  group_by(sentiment)%>%
  arrange(desc(n), .by_group=TRUE) %>%
  ungroup()
HICSS_bing <- HICSS_bing %>%
  group_by(sentiment) %>%
  top_n(50)%>%
  ungroup()

```
